titleStmt.title: A congratulatory poem written by J. S. And occasionally published on the 23d. of April, 1685: being the Coronation-Day of their Most Sacred Majesties, &c.
titleStmt.author: I. S.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "When mournful Britain droop'd her conquering head,".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
